ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I deleted all no drop items before I deleted the character, so when I deleted her she had 0 items/pp on her or in the bank.  If I did not have my epic
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I deleted all no drop items before I deleted the character, so when
I deleted her she had 0 items/pp on her or in the bank. If I did not
have my epic (everything else is easily replaced) I would not play her.
I don't know if I want to bother trying heh.

Shaisi

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]

Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....

all

Sorry if I opened a can of worms for ya man.

Kitasi
